2.title: Nehemiah Sent
2.keyEvent: Nehemiah granted permission to rebuild walls

4.title: Opposition to Rebuilding
4.keyEvent: Enemies oppose but work continues with prayer

5.title: Social Justice Addressed
5.keyEvent: Nehemiah confronts exploitation among the people

6.title: Plots Against Nehemiah
6.keyEvent: Nehemiah resists enemies' schemes and completes wall

8.title: Reading the Law
8.keyEvent: Ezra reads the Law to the people

9.title: Confession and Covenant
9.keyEvent: People confess sins and renew covenant

10.title: Covenant Confirmed
10.keyEvent: Leaders and people sign covenant to obey

11.title: Resettling Jerusalem
11.keyEvent: Leaders and people settle in Jerusalem

12.title: Priests and Levites Listed
12.keyEvent: Priests and Levites appointed for service

13.title: Nehemiah's Reforms
13.keyEvent: Nehemiah enforces covenant and reforms practices
